title: Dishwasher Circulation Pump with Heater
description: Dishwasher Circulation Pump with Heater ★★★★★ ★★★★★ 5 Reviews PartSelect Number PS11724988 Manufacturer Part Number 12008381 This circulation pump with heater is for dishwashers. Circulation pump with heater moves heated water through the spray arm to clean the dishes. Unplug the dishwasher before installing this part. Wear work gloves to protect your hands.

installationInstructions.author: Claire from ALPINE, AZ
installationInstructions.title: The washer had an error message in the display of E:09. I called Bosh on customer srevice and she said that the heat pump was not working and needed to be replaced. Since the motor is the main part for this that needed to be replaced as well. The pars were under $200.00 total so we oted to fix this
installationInstructions.content: We followed the video and had no problems with leaks at all afterwards. The parts fit perfectly and the machine is working great again.
